column5: Looking for opinions on the park, it's fishing and facilities from anybody that has been. We are booked for Restoule for our late August trip, but, are looking for another possible camping trip for two or three nights a little closer to home. Taking my 14 ft aluminum Legend if we go. Thanks!
Balsam Lake PP was a favorite of our family for many years great park in my opinion. Fishing is pretty good, big muskie and good small and largemouth.
